title: Re: Are you one of "them"?
content:
I am not. Or maybe I am one in disguise. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-mortlol.gif[/img]

These poll questions get more intelligent day by day. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-lol.gif[/img] 3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: Are you one of "them"?
content: Gramatically speaking, shouldn't the question really be "Are you one of those?"

title: Re: Are you one of "them"?
content:
Umm... Yes.

I am one of 'them'.


If and only if "them" means a libertarian, athiest 3.615 GPA high school student who listens to Eminem, Tupac, Game, and Jay-Z.~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
I've changed a lot since my last time on this forum...
